Author: tinuvhiel
Text: thank you so much, i am really trying my best. the place where i am now has a buffet style lunch hall so i am able to eat my safe foods at that time at least!! feeling a bit better today. thanks for this xx

Author: vmprbbbt
Text: Honestly this might be super unhelpful but I just spent a week in Turkey eating lots and lots of beautiful Turkish food and the only thing that calmed me down when I started to feel panicky about overeating was the knowledge that when I got home I could go back to eating “normally”.   You’d be surprised how much you’re walking and burning off every day, and probably even overestimating how much you’re eating.   Try and focus on the experience of trying Greek food as a necessary part of your travelling and exploration of the culture, you won’t be there forever! Enjoy the rest of your trip, you deserve it ❤️
